    • addGoods

      public OrderedGoods addGoods​(long id, java.lang.String name, int quantity, Order order) throws MyException
      Method to add goods to order
      Parameters:
      id - goods id, id or name are used to identify goods
      name - goods name, id or name are used to identify goods
      quantity - goods quantity to order, should be non-negative
      order - order which goods has to be connected with
      Returns:
      ordered goods object ot null if there are not goods with these name or id
      Throws:
      MyException - if the DAO class throw it
